name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit.streams.cache.expiry.ms
description:
This controls the minimum amount of time
    file descriptors need to sit in the client cache context
    before they can be closed for being inactive for too long.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.max-retries
description:
The SecondaryNameNode retries failed checkpointing. If the 
  failure occurs while loading fsimage or replaying edits, the number of
  retries is limited by this variable.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.key.update-interval
description:
The update interval for master key for delegation tokens 
       in the namenode in milliseconds.

name: fs.s3a.connection.maximum
description:
Controls the maximum number of simultaneous connections to S3.
    This must be bigger than the value of fs.s3a.threads.max so as to stop
    threads being blocked waiting for new HTTPS connections.
    Why not equal? The AWS SDK transfer manager also uses these connections.

name: dfs.namenode.max-num-blocks-to-log
description:
Puts a limit on the number of blocks printed to the log by the Namenode
    after a block report.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make to establish
               a server connection.

name: dfs.content-summary.sleep-microsec
description:
The length of time in microseconds to put the thread to sleep, between reaquiring the locks
    in content summary computation.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-xattrs-per-inode
description: Maximum number of extended attributes per inode.

name: dfs.datanode.slow.io.warning.threshold.ms
description:
The threshold in milliseconds at which we will log a slow
    io warning in a datanode. By default, this parameter is set to 300
    milliseconds.
